OPTOUT.TITLE: Manage Opt-outs efficiently
OPTOUT.SUBTITLE: Opt-out Management
OPTOUT.TEXT: An Opt-out is a removal request from someone you store data on to your organization. The person in charge of responding to these requests will receive alerts and be given monthly reports about their performance.
CONSENT.TITLE: Store every consent
CONSENT.SUBTITLE: Cookie Consent Management
CONSENT.TEXT: Consent logs are stored in an encrypted database and can be used as proof of consent in case of an audit.
